alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:03PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Idaho and western Ravalli Counties through 230 PM PDT... At 102 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles southeast of Grangeville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orogrande, Elk City, Fall Creek, Newsome and Golden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
